message: Bob, I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. It's a fair offer considering I'm losing money to inflation at a slower rate than you. Let's end this quickly!
Alice, I propose a 55/45 split in my favor.  While your inflation rate is lower, I'm losing money faster.  Let's be reasonable and end this before we both lose too much.
Bob, this is getting us nowhere.  I'm lowering my demand slightly to 58/42.  Consider that if you reject this, the pot will shrink even further for both of us in the next round.
